name: At the End of the Rainbow (Demo)
name_original: At the End of the Rainbow (Demo)
description:
Demo version of At the End of the Rainbow, a super fun and challenging platformer mobile video game about a supernatural little Irish being who had all his gold stolen by other fairies.

Immerse yourself in this great adventure, traveling through the clouds, to recover the precious treasure of the leprechaun!

Free to play.

Available for Android.
